name: check admin ID Null OR insdie List
IE Maker Lab Admin page for returning tools
info:
# IE Maker Lab Admin page for returning tools

### Step 
- Step 1: 
    - Place Admin ID card on the ID reader in first form
    - Wait until the card Reader successfully read the staff ID
    - Click "Submit" button to submit

- Step 2:
    - Place Student ID card on the ID reader in second form
    - Submit student ID after checking
